text: Secret Wedding () is a 1989 Argentinian drama film directed by Alejandro Agresti.https://www.bfi.org.uk/films-tv-people/4ce2b79fd084b The film won the Golden Calf for Best Feature Film award at the 1989 Netherlands Film Festival.https://www.filmfestival.nl/archief/secret-wedding/ The film wasn't shown in Argentina for 15 years until it was broadcast on Televisión Pública Argentina in 2004.https://www.lanacion.com.ar/espectaculos/boda-secreta-se- estrena-en-canal-7-nid613193/amp == References == == External links == * Category:1989 films Category:Argentine films Category:Spanish-language films Category:1989 drama films Category:Argentine drama films
title: Secret Wedding
